<h2>Absolute URLs</h2>

<p><a href="https://www.w3.org/4">W3C</a></p>
<h2>Relative URLs</h2>
<p><a href="html_images.asp">HTML Images</a></p>
<p><a href="/css/default.asp">CSS Tutorial</a></p>
<p><a href="https://www.google.com/search">CSS Tutorial</a></p>
